AboutPage.self intro:
Hello! I'm Tsai Hsiang-Yi, a passionate self-taught enthusiast of Intelligent Robotics. I've represented Taiwan as both a competitor and coach in international robotics competitions.

Recently, I've been focusing on Machine Learning, particularly TinyML and Edge AI. I'm excited to explore how these technologies can be integrated into the future of Intelligent Robotics.

asar.name: ASAR Chatbot Design Platform
asar.description: Asar is a lightweight platform for designing chatbots, seamlessly integrating with Raspberry Pi to offer a streamlined, end-to-end chatbot deployment process. With just a single-board computer, developers can effortlessly create their own custom chatbot.

sensorAdapterStm8.name: Analog / Digital Sensor Adapter for LEGO EV3 (STM8 Version)
sensorAdapterStm8.description: As is well known, common analog/digital sensors cannot communicate directly with the LEGO EV3. Therefore, we use a MCU to convert sensor data and information into LEGO UART format and then transmit the information to the EV3 host via the LEGO UART Protocol.

sensorAdapterAttiny85.name: Analog / Digital Sensor Adapter for LEGO EV3 (Attiny85 Version)
sensorAdapterAttiny85.description: As is well known, common analog/digital sensors cannot communicate directly with the LEGO EV3. Therefore, we use a MCU to convert sensor data and information into LEGO UART format and then transmit the information to the EV3 host via the LEGO UART Protocol.

huskylensAdapter.name: HuskyLens Adapter For LEGO EV3 (Support SPIKE/RI)
huskylensAdapter.description: An adapter allow HuskyLens communication with LEGO EV3 (support SPIKE/RI).

retailpia.name: Retailpia
retailpia.description: A game blending island-building, storytelling, accounting, and points collection, winner of the Better Retail award at the Showcode Level-Up Society Hackathon.

smartCigaretteButtRecyclingStation.name: Smart Cigarette Butt Recycling Station
smartCigaretteButtRecyclingStation.description: A concept that combines cigarette butt recycling with a deposit system to encourage proper disposal and reduce pollution. It uses Mask R-CNN technology for accurate recognition of cigarette butts in complex backgrounds. This idea was a top ten finalist at AI EXPO 2022.

usefulEV3Blocks.name: Useful EV3 Blocks
usefulEV3Blocks.description: Homemade EV3 blocks, give you advanced functions, or make NXT sensor new life.
